ppy/osu.summary: The osu repository has seen significant activity, with two recent pull requests. The first, 'Enhance beatmap editing flow by adding an audio tab', aims to improve the beatmap editing experience by introducing a new audio tab inspired by FL Studio's piano roll, allowing users to easily set samples, banks, and volumes for hit objects. The second, 'Change `OsuModRelax` hit leniency to be the same as in stable', fixes a discrepancy in hit leniency between the Relax mod and the stable version of osu, ensuring a more consistent experience.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: The osu-wiki repository has also experienced notable activity, with two pull requests focused on improving the wiki's content. One update, '[ID] Update/Retranslate `Help centre/Account restrictions`', aims to translate and update the Help Centre's account restrictions page, enhancing the wiki's accessibility and accuracy. Another contribution, 'Expand Difficulty Reduction mod articles', seeks to expand the wiki's coverage of the Difficulty Reduction mod, providing more comprehensive information to the osu community.
